original_text: And among the rebels in prison, who had committed murder in the insurrection, there was a man called Barabbas.
korean_text: 민란을 꾸미고 그 민란중에 살인하고 체포된 자 중에 바라바라 하는 자가 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And among the rebels in prison
who had committed murder in the insurrection
there was a man called Barabbas
